name: yelped
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
yelp
to make a sudden, short, high sound, usually when in pain: I accidentally stepped on the dog's foot and it yelped. She yelped, as if being punched in the stomach. Synonym
yap
to say something suddenly and quickly, like someone who is in pain: "Nooooo," yelped a small girl at one point. "This is an outrage!" he yelped.
